hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity-Driven Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a period of suppressed volatility (BTC 20-day realized volatility < 40%) during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, the first major liquidity injection (>$5B) will trigger a volatility expansion where BTC moves >12% in either direction within 5 days, with 70% probability to the upside if injection occurs above $80K BTC.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Liquidity acts as 'volatility fuel.' After October's crash, markets are in a fragile equilibrium. New liquidity disrupts this balance, triggering outsized moves. The political/liquidity control narrative suggests these injections are becoming more predictable catalysts.
entry_conditions: Enter on break above/below 2-day ATR channel

exit_conditions.take_profit: 12% move achieved OR volatility expands to >60% annualized
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Return to pre-breakout volatility regime (<35% RV)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Liquidity injection >$5B fails to increase 5-day realized volatility by at least 15 percentage points.
